alert.note: Alert for Montgomery; Telfair; Toombs; Wheeler (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 5:10PM EDT until August 08 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Toombs County in southeastern Georgia... East central Telfair County in central Georgia... Southeastern Wheeler County in central Georgia... Southern Montgomery County in central Georgia... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 510 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Towns, or 8 miles south of Alamo, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lumber City, Uvalda, Scotland, Alston, Towns, Spring Hill, Grays Landing, Cedar Crossing, Jordan, Charlotteville, and McNatt Falls. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
